title: NCI Downgraded by TheStreet to Hold (NCIT)
content: TheStreet downgraded shares of NCI (NASDAQ:NCIT) from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research note issued to investors on Friday, MarketBeat Ratings reports. Shares of NCI (NASDAQ:NCIT) traded down 1.20% during trading on Friday, reaching $14.03. 1,849 shares of the company were exchanged. NCI has a one year low of $8.20 and […]
